body: Today I stumbled across the server [IP-REDACTED] (german) and saw that they have a gamemode exactly like dtm... They have far more players... I would like it if you looked after gamemode "minecraft cores" in yt and watch a video. Please tell me what you think about it. THIS SHOULD NOT BE ANY ADVERTISEMENT. I am just annoyed by them taking your idea or maybe from another server ._.
body_tagged: Today I stumbled across the server [IP-REDACTED] (german) and saw that they have a gamemode exactly like dtm... They have far more players... I would like it if you looked after gamemode "minecraft cores" in yt and watch a video. Please tell me what you think about it. THIS SHOULD NOT BE ANY ADVERTISEMENT. I am just annoyed by them taking your idea or maybe from another server ._.
title: Servers copying gamemodes?

replies.body: I don't think this is much of a problem. Overcast had destroy the monument before us, yet they aren't trying to take us down. We have no copyright or anything on the gamemode so I don't think anything can be done. Don't take my word for it, but I really don't think anything will happen. :<
replies.body_tagged: I don't think this is much of a problem. Overcast had destroy the monument before us, yet they aren't trying to take us down. We have no copyright or anything on the gamemode so I don't think anything can be done. Don't take my word for it, but I really don't think anything will happen. :<

replies.body: Many servers have objectives gamemodes, whether it is DTM, CTW or CTF. This isn't the only one. And yea like what Badger said, it isn't much of a problem.
replies.body_tagged: Many servers have objectives gamemodes, whether it is DTM, CTW or CTF. This isn't the only one. And yea like what Badger said, it isn't much of a problem.

replies.body:
What's the policy on game modes? How does this work with sky wars, prison, survival, creative, and etc.
being on a variety of servers. I know Avicus has special game modes, but why can't other people use
the idea?
